timeline.bodyText: This line should also update to com.azure:azure-spring-boot-starter-active-directory, same as other README.md files
timeline.author: zhoufenqin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,9 +19,9 @@ With Spring Starter for Azure Active Directory, now you can get started quickly
 [//]: # "{x-version-update-start;com.microsoft.azure:azure-active-directory-spring-boot-starter;current}"

timeline.author: zhoufenqin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -70,7 +70,7 @@ application to use the Spring annotations and classes to protect the web app.
    ```xml
    <dependency>
        <groupId>com.azure</groupId>
-       <artifactId>azure-active-directory-b2c-spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
+       <artifactId>azure--spring-boot-starter-active-directory-b2c</artifactId>
